rev.comment: restored sectNPOV - only the intro section is in question. See talk page.
restored sect-NPOV - only the intro section is in question. See talk page.
templ:sectNPOV -> templ:NPOV, as presumably the top message is for the entire article?

Reverted edits by [[Special:Contributions/24.190.58.202|24.190.58.202]] to last version by Sarahg
make history broader but with less depth, move 1935 publication to the list of books
remove some see-also entries that appear prominently in the body of the article
change history subsection to "origins" merge bit of modern history into the intro of the next section.
stating that feminism was primarily motivated by the experience of women constitues non-consensus opinion. the article should not lead with it.
took out especially, when refrencing "sexual objectification" makes the definition bias.
/* Effect of Feminism in the West */ Added sub-category distinction.
/* Worldwide statistics */Still in dispute, please see the talk page
no sources for such a "movement", which is listed on vfd anyway
/* Perspective: the nature of the modern movement */ actually, feminists don't agree on that point; see the recent debate over expanding the selective service act to women
/* Perspective: the nature of the modern movement */ strike that ad hominem attack, it is factual but constitutes insinuation in this context and thus not NPOV
/* Worldwide statistics */ much is too much, and suffers from being both strong and vague.
Reverted edits by [[Special:Contributions/24.190.58.202|24.190.58.202]] to last version by Scott Burley
Restore intro paragraph to non-dictionary version
try to arrange the subtypes so that similar types are grouped. this is certainly only a first cut at this, but it would be nice to see the connections without having to read each subtopic one-by-one
revert, slrubenstein is continuing his attempts to bias the article by de-emphasizing the common and basic meaning of the term. (see talk).

rv, previous commit was vandalism. previous committer wished to expunge some facts that he would rather people not know
talk reveals that no substantive dispute actually exists, some rewording is needed to lay the issue to rest though
/* Worldwide statistics */ rm disputed tag, the source has has been cited on talk
repair a few things, some based on talk
/* Subtypes of feminism */ libertarian feminism is just an alias for individualist feminism, place both on one line with one wiki-link
/* Feminism in many forms */ several the types redirect to pro-sex feminism already. move all of those into one entry.
Restore, and amend (note to other contributors, it's better to correct than to revert)
rv. feminism is not a primarily political movement. aspects of feminism may include political activism, however
introduce a distinction between feminism as defined by the dictionary and Feminism as a political movement. e.g., one might support the concept of feminism but not identify with Feminist Politics
/* Effect on religion */ Cleaning up sloppy prose.
/* Effect of Feminism in the West */ Moved the moral education section below the religion section
well, that's the way she writes her name. anyway, this way bypasses a redirect.
/* Relationship to other movements */ Did e.e.cummings write this?
